definition[0]: a long area of high land, especially at the top of a mountain
example[0]: We made our way carefully along the ridge.
definition[1]: something long and thin that is raised above the things around it
example[1]: A small ridge of sand separated the field from the beach.
example[2]: The ridges on the soles give the shoes a better grip.
definition[2]: the part at the top of a roof, where the two sides meet
